climatePledgeFriendly.details: Global Recycled Standard products are made with at least 50% recycled content and meet social, environmental, and chemical requirements.

features: 🎁Height & Angle Adjustable - The universal adjustable phone stand can be titled to vertical, and height can be extended up to 3.2 inches. It allows you to get a more comfortable viewing angle and height. Reduce the frequency of looking down at the phone screen to avoid hurting your back and neck. A perfect desktop accessory that frees your hands to watch online class, do live stream.

🎁Thick Case Friendly - This cellphone stand work for phone with thick case up to 0.71 inches thick. The enlarged & thickened anti-slip & anti-scratch silicone mats on the backrest, hooks and base feet protect your moilephone from sliding and scratching. Durable materials and the high-precision smooth surface prevent this phone stand from scratch and break even after long-term use.

🎁Full Foldable & Portable - This portable phone stand is easy to carry by anyone. Bi-folding design allows this foldable mobile stand to be pocket-sized. Simply fold it up to a small size anytime and carry around into a handbag, backpack wherever you travel or business trip. Necessary office desk accessories & workspace organizers, office supplies, cell phone accessories.

🎁Weighted Metal Base - As to ensure the stability, the telescopic rod and the base of this mobile phone stand are made of weighted excellent metal. The exquisite groove design of the base match with the strong adjustable rod allows your mobilephone to rest steadily on it, even with a thick case. It’s the best Thanksgiving Day, Christmas gift.

🎁Wide Compatibility - Universal table phone holder works for telephones and tablets between 4 - 8 inches, such as Apple iPhone 15, iPhone 15 Pro, iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPhone 15 Plus, iPhone 14, 14 Pro, 14 Pro Max, 14 Plus, 13, 13 Pro, 13 Pro Max, 13 Mini, 12, 12 Pro, 12 Pro Max, 12 Mini, 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, XS, XS Max, XR, X, 8, 7, 7 Plus, 6, 6 Plus, SE, SE2, android, Galaxy S22, S22 Ultra, S21 Ultra, S21, S20, A72, A71, A52, A51, LG, pixel, Nexus, Huawei, iPad mini. Best Christmas Gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Folds up neatly. Holds my phone (Galaxy S10+) with charging cord coming out the bottom. adjustable height. Stable. Slip resistant. weighted base.The stated dimensions seem very accurate except the weight. Mine weighs 192 grams, vs. 222 grams for my phone+case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and useful
reviews.reviewText: This phone stand is awesome. It's a pretty pink color, just like in the photos. The stand is sturdy, stands up easily, can fold away quickly and compact. Perfect for holding my phone upright to be able to see and get to it easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little phone stand!
reviews.reviewText: I didn't expect to like this stand so much. These would make a great gift for family members. I purchased this for my desk but found myself carrying it to the kitchen or moving it to the coffee table. So, I ended up purchasing another one in purple so I could just leave it where I needed it. I love that they fold up so compactly and can be angled in multiple ways. When I first was reading reviews I didn't see anyone mention having a Google Pixel or how it worked for the pro-sized ones. I'm happy to report both my husband and my pixels fit. I have a Google Pixel Pro 6 and he has an 8. There was no falling over and I could angle it a few ways rather than just one height. Others complained they couldn't do this with their phone. So, I'm not sure why they had an issue. But, this is a great stand and surprisingly good quality. I'd purchase it again in more colors. My teen daughter has been hinting at my getting her one for her iPhone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice phone holder
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these, one purple, one black. The black was slightly crooked and you could only tell it was when it was holding the phone. The company has taken care of the issue. The purple one was perfect and feels quite sturdy with a nice weight to it. I like how it folds up and is extremely adjustable. Good holder and am glad I got it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Totally meets my needs
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy base, adjustable with the perfect amount of resistance, outstanding grippy backplate, and attractive. Also like that it’s elevated which allows you to charge while in the cradle. Purchased 1 for work and 1 for home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, but heavy
reviews.reviewText: First I want to say overall I am really pleased with the stand. This is a good product. It is well designed and sturdy.It’s not going to fall apart on you. You can pose your phone in multiple positions and it will not shift once placed. My iPhone 13 fits well on it and a larger phone would have no issues.It has a built in silicone pad to prevent the phone from moving when placed. It also seems to help with heat.There are also silicone grips for feet so it doesn’t slide on uneven or glass surfaces.They color matched the logo with the brass/gold in the green color which is a nice touch and an attention to detail often missed from others.Everything functions as designed and the seller was prompt in getting the item out and it was well packaged.I have one pro/con. It is a major one and that is the weight which affects its use as something travel friendly. It is quite heavy.I originally got this for dual purpose so I could use it around the house and when out and about as I’m disabled and often drop things/ knock things over due to my neurological issues.Trial and error (and numerous broken phones and other broken accessories) has led me to figure out portable stands work best for me personally.That way if I’m in the kitchen at a table, or at a restaurant, or at an doctors appointment I can just shove it on whatever flat surface is nearby and monkey around for a few, toss the stand in my walker basket when done and go; or have a phone stand for overnight charging when I go to bed or do virtual calls or general scrolling.This while a good stand is far too heavy for all of that.It has a weighted base to avoid tip over. They probably went a bit overboard on how much weight was necessary.While I can say it’s not going anywhere when the phones on it I can also say it’s not leaving the house. It’s just too heavy to keep in my purse or shove in my carryon.I handed it to my Mom for her assessment and she agreed on the weight being too heavy for travel. She did also like the stand in general and it even held her massively oversized overstuffed wallet case iPhone 13 without tipping.I think they could adjust the weight in the base slightly to make it lighter while still holding the same function. Right now this is advertised as a travel friendly stand and I would have to disagree with that statement.It is however a wonderful stand for your home office or next to your nightstand.Will keep, but knocking one star off for it not actually living up to the multipurpose travel friendly design description.Still using for home and don’t regret buying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As sturdy and functional as could be
reviews.reviewText: I have been using a lightweight faux-wood phone stand for a couple of years. It was ok, but it weighed less than the phone. It tilted a lot, and the phone ended up on my desk or the floor. This inexpensive device is far better. First and foremost, I can store my Samsung A11 phone at any angle and a range of heights. Thus, I can see the screen easily. Adjusting the height and the viewing angle is easy, and the phone stays just the way I set the stand. It's easy to attach the charging cable when the phone is on the stand, as well as being easy to put the phone on the stand with the cable already attached. This might sound trivial, but it matters and it works.For now, I'm using the shipping box as a travel case (4 in. x 2 7/8 in. x 1 1/8 in.); however, as sturdy as this stand is, I doubt the stand needs protection. Furthermore, when the case is fully folded, it stays folded, and there are no protruding edges to snag other items in my suitcase.I recommend this.device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the right weight, portable, and flexible
reviews.reviewText: This phone stand holds my Samsung phone with case.It folds down to a compact size so it can be easily thrown in a backpack or a pocket. It's heavy enough that it doesn't jiggle around while using the phone. Folded down, the phone shelf doesn't stick out so it's not going to snag or hook onto anything when it's carried.It has tight operation so when you set the stand to your desired height and viewing angle, it will stay in a position.I recommend this stand for its portability and reliability.
Buen producto a buen precio y con una muy buena calidad en los materiales así como excelente funcionalidad, cumple con lo prometido.

This is an excellent product. I got the pink one and colour is exactly as shown. Very nice.A few features to note that stand out:-very well made, not cheap like many others-sturdy, weighted base for stability-easily folds for carry and go in purse or bag-phone stays on securely-no assembly required, just fold out and you’re ready to go-overall an excellent product & easy to take anywhere-good value for money and highly recommend thisLove it. And will be buying a few more for gifts.
Bon produitfonction respectée, stable, solide, réglable et joli.Parfait !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Very sturdy and has multiple positions
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Lamicall Foldable Phone Stand for my desk and I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. As someone who uses my phone for work and personal use, having a reliable and sturdy phone stand is essential for me. After using this stand for a few weeks, I can confidently say that it has exceeded my expectations.One of the standout features of this phone stand is its height adjustability. I can easily adjust the height of the stand to my preferred viewing angle, whether I am sitting or standing. This has greatly improved my posture while using my phone, as I no longer have to strain my neck to look down at my screen.The cradle dock design is also a major plus for me. It securely holds my iPhone 12 Pro Max in place without any wobbling or slipping. I also appreciate that the cradle is wide enough to accommodate my phone even with a case on. It can also hold a variety of phone sizes, making it a versatile option for different devices.The build quality of this phone stand is top-notch. It is made of high-quality aluminum alloy and has a sturdy and stable base, which gives me confidence that my phone is safe and secure while on the stand. The foldable design is also a great feature, as it allows for easy storage and portability. I can easily fold it up and take it with me wherever I go.In terms of compatibility, this phone stand works with a wide range of devices. I have used it with my iPhone, iPad, and even my Samsung Galaxy S10 without any issues. This makes it a great choice for households with multiple devices.Overall, I highly recommend the Lamicall Foldable Phone Stand for anyone in need of a reliable and versatile phone stand for their desk. It has exceeded my expectations in terms of functionality, build quality, and compatibility. It is a great investment for anyone who spends a significant amount of time on their phone.
